nodes.text: The Bomerwrights of Sullest were a group which constructed laser swords. Luke Starkiller gave Han Solo a chrome handled sword made by them following their arrival at Yavin 4.
This was the first mention of Sullust in the scripts. At this point, "laser swords" were used by everyone, including stormtroopers. The reference was dropped in the third draft.[source?]
